attributes.additional_details:
The Country's welfare is too important to leave to inexperienced/unqualified people.
This petition calls for any minister holding a specific cabinet office to have a minimum of 12 month's experience working in a relevant occupation.
Examples.
Health: must have worked in a hospital or medical practice.
Defense: has recent experience in the forces.
Education: must have worked in an educational establishment  rated "Outstanding" by OFSTED.
